plugin.name: unityshell
plugin.long: Plugin to draw the Unity Shell

option.name: show_menu_bar
option.short: Key to show the menu bar while pressed
option.long: Reveals the global menu bar while pressed.

option.name: lock_screen
option.long: Pressing this key will lock the current session.

option.name: show_hud
option.short: Key to show the HUD when tapped
option.long: A tap on this key summons the HUD.

option.name: execute_command
option.long: Opens a folder or executes a command.

option.name: show_desktop_key
option.long: Hide all windows and focus desktop.

option.name: panel_first_menu
option.short: Key to open the first panel menu
option.long: Opens the first indicator menu of the Panel, allowing keyboard navigation thereafter.

option.name: spread_app_windows
option.short: Key to spread the current application windows
option.long: Initiate the window Spread for the current application windows.

option.name: spread_app_windows_anywhere
option.short: Key to spread the current application windows in any workspace
option.long: Initiate the window Spread for the current application windows, for all the windows.

option.name: panel_opacity
option.long: The opacity of the Panel background.

option.name: panel_opacity_maximized_toggle
option.short: Panel Opacity for Maximized Windows Toggle
option.long: When a window is maximized and visible in the current viewport, the panel opacity is disabled.

option.name: background_color
option.long: Background color override for the Dash, Launcher and Switcher.

option.name: dash_blur_experimental
option.long: Type of blur in the Dash.

option.name: automaximize_value
option.long: The minimum value to trigger automaximize.

option.name: shortcut_overlay
option.long: Enables possibility to display an overlay showing available mouse and keyboard shortcuts.

option.name: low_graphics_mode
option.long: Enables low graphics mode regardless of hardware in the system

option.name: override_decoration_theme
option.long: Each Gtk theme can provide shadow parameters, but you can override these values here.

option.name: shadow_x_offset
option.long: Horizontal offset of the shadow.

option.name: shadow_y_offset
option.long: Vertical offset of the shadow.

option.name: active_shadow_radius
option.long: The radius of the shadow blur for the active window.

option.name: active_shadow_color
option.long: The color of the shadows for the active window.

option.name: inactive_shadow_radius
option.long: The radius of the shadow blur for the inactive windows.

option.name: inactive_shadow_color
option.long: The color of the shadows for the inactive windows.

option.name: show_launcher
option.short: Key to show the Dash, Launcher and Help Overlay
option.long: Holding this key makes the Launcher and Help Overlay appear. Tapping it opens the Dash.

option.name: keyboard_focus
option.short: Key to give keyboard-focus to the Launcher
option.long: Gives keyboard-focus to the Launcher so it can be navigated with the cursor-keys.

option.name: launcher_switcher_forward
option.short: Key to start the Launcher Application Switcher
option.long: Cycles through icons present in the Launcher. Activates the highlighted icon on release.

option.name: launcher_switcher_prev
option.short: Key to start the Launcher Application Switcher in reverse
option.long: Cycles through icons present in the Launcher, in reverse order. Activates the highlighted icon on release.

option.name: dash_tap_duration
option.long: Duration (in millseconds) that will count as a tap for opening the Dash.

option.name: launcher_opacity
option.long: The opacity of the Launcher background.

option.name: launcher_hide_mode
option.long: Make the Launcher hide automatically after some time of inactivity.

option.name: autohide_animation
option.long: Animation played when the Launcher is showing or hiding.

option.name: num_launchers
option.long: Selects on which display the Launcher will be present.

option.name: launcher_capture_mouse
option.long: Determines if the Launcher's edges will capture the mousepointer.

option.name: scroll_inactive_icons
option.short: Scroll Inactive Icon to Focus Application
option.long: Allows using the mouse scrollwheel to focus an application if the icon is inactive.

option.name: launcher_minimize_window
option.long: Allows minimizing a single windowed application by clicking on its Launcher icon.

option.name: edge_responsiveness
option.long: A conglomerate setting that modifies the overall responsiveness of the Launcher reveal.

option.name: reveal_pressure
option.long: Amount of mouse pressure required to reveal the Launcher.

option.name: overcome_pressure
option.long: Amount of mouse pressure required to push the mousepointer into the next monitor.

option.name: decay_rate
option.long: The rate at which mouse pressure decays.

option.name: stop_velocity
option.long: The maximum velocity at which the mouse will still be stopped.

option.name: edge_passed_disabled_ms
option.short: Duration of Sticky Edge Release after Break
option.long: The number of milliseconds Sticky Edges are deactivated for after the barrier has been broken.

option.name: icon_size
option.long: The size of the icons in the Launcher.

option.name: backlight_mode
option.long: Change how the icons in the Launcher are backlit.

option.name: launch_animation
option.long: The icon animation playing during the launch of a process.

option.name: urgent_animation
option.long: The icon animation playing when a Launcher Icon is in the urgent state.

option.name: menus_fadein
option.long: Duration (in milliseconds) of the menus fade-in animation, used when the mouse goes over the top-panel.

option.name: menus_fadeout
option.long: Duration (in milliseconds) of the menus fade-out animation, used when the mouse goes over the top-panel.

option.name: menus_discovery_duration
option.long: How many seconds the menus should be shown when a new application has been launched.

option.name: menus_discovery_fadein
option.long: Duration (in milliseconds) of the menus fade-in animation, used when the menus of a new launched application have been shown.

option.name: menus_discovery_fadeout
option.long: Duration (in milliseconds) of the menus fade-out animation, used when the menus of a new launched application have been shown.

option.name: alt_tab_forward
option.long: Switches to the next open window on the actual viewport.

option.name: alt_tab_prev
option.short: Key to switch to the previous window in the Switcher
option.long: Switches to the previous open window on the actual viewport, once the Switcher has been revealed.

option.name: alt_tab_forward_all
option.short: Key to start the Switcher for all viewports
option.long: Switches to the next open window, including windows of all viewports.

option.name: alt_tab_prev_all
option.short: Key to switch to the previous window in the Switcher for all viewports
option.long: Switches to the previous open window, once the Switcher has been revealed, including windows of all viewports.

option.name: alt_tab_next_window
option.short: Key to flip through windows in the Switcher
option.long: Flips through all the windows present in the Switcher.

option.name: alt_tab_prev_window
option.short: Key to flip through windows in the Switcher backwards
option.long: Flips through all the windows present in the Switcher, in reverse order.

option.name: switch_strictly_between_applications
option.long: Disables the last focused window being the first entry in the Switcher, so Switcher strictly switches between applications

option.name: show_minimized_windows
option.short: Show live previews of windows in the Switcher
option.long: Enables miniature live window previews in the Switcher.

option.name: alt_tab_timeout
option.short: Timed automatic to show live previews in the Switcher
option.long: Automatically spreads multiple windows of the same application out into a grid after a short time.

option.name: alt_tab_bias_viewport
option.short: Bias alt-tab to prefer windows on the current viewport
option.long: Bias the Switcher to prefer windows which are placed on the current viewport.

option.name: disable_show_desktop
option.short: Disable Show Desktop in the Switcher
option.long: Disables the Show Desktop icon in the Switcher.

option.name: disable_mouse
option.short: Disable the mouse in the Switcher
option.long: Disables the mouse in the Switcher.
